title: Spy vs. spy: How GenAI is powering defenders and attackers
summary: The article "Spy vs. Spy: How GenAI is Powering Defenders and Attackers" explores the dual role of Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) in cybersecurity. On the defensive side, GenAI aids in identifying vulnerabilities, predicting threats, and automating responses to enhance protection against cyber threats. title: Cloudflare blames today's outage on emergency React2Shell patch
summary: Cloudflare experienced an outage due to an emergency patch for the React2Shell vulnerability, which prompted an urgent update across its systems. The patch aimed to address a critical flaw, but it inadvertently caused disruptions in service availability for users worldwide. Cloudflare quickly identified the issue and worked to restore functionality by rolling back the changes and implementing a more stable fix. The company emphasized its commitment to security and transparency, acknowledging the inconvenience caused to customers while prioritizing the rapid resolution of such vulnerabilities.
